AT.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
AT.description: Als Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers erschien, hat es das Kampfspielgenre für immer verändert. Zusammen mit einem revolutionären Kombo-System brachte es auch neue Charaktere mit sich. Außer z. B. Ryu, Ken, Chun Li kannst du dir jetzt mit vier brandneuen Akteuren hitzige Kämpfe liefern. Wähle T. Hawk mit seiner beispiellosen Kraft, Dee Jay und sein unerreichtes Können als Kickboxer, das feurige Kung-Fu von Fei Long, oder lehre deinen Gegnern mit der gefährlich hübschen Cammy das Fürchten! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
AU.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
BG.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: Super Street Fighter™ II: The New Challengers
CA.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre would be forever changed. Along with a revolutionary combo system, the game introduced a new set of challengers to fight alongside the original Street Fighter II cast. In addition to the classic characters, players take control of four brand new characters in exciting head-to-head fighting game play! Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength to crush your opponents. Use Deejay's unrivaled kickboxing ability to defeat your opponents. Fight with the furious kung fu of Fei Long and unleash your inner dragon. Drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy and emerge victorious. Get ready for the Street Fighter Tournament and to fight!

BR.name: Super Street Fighter™ II: The New Challengers
BR.description: Depois que o jogo Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers foi lançado pela primeira vez, os jogos de luta nunca mais foram os mesmos. Juntamente com um sistema revolucionário de combinação de movimentos, o jogo introduziu um novo grupo de desafiantes para lutar ao lado do elenco original de Street Fighter II. Além dos personagens clássicos, os jogadores assumem o controle de quatro personagens totalmente novos em um emocionante jogo de luta corpo a corpo. Escolha T. Hawk e sua força inigualável para esmagar seus oponentes. Use a habilidade incomparável de lutar kickboxing de Dee Jay para derrotar seus oponentes. Lute com Fei Long, o furioso lutador de kung fu, e liberte o dragão que está dentro dele. Encante seus adversários com a beleza fatal de Cammy e saia vitorioso. Prepare-se para lutar no torneio Street Fighter!

FI.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
FI.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

EE.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers

Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
ES.description: La aparición de Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers revolucionó los juegos de lucha por completo. Dotado de un sistema de combos inédito, introdujo cuatro nuevos personajes que se sumaron a Ryu, Ken, Chun Li y los demás. ¡Métete en su piel y haz que tus adversarios muerdan el polvo! ¡Elige a T. Hawk y su fuerza descomunal; Dee Jay, el kickboxer sin igual; Fei Long, el maestro de Kung-fu o a Cammy, la mujer fatal! Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

FR.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
FR.description: À sa sortie, Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers a révolutionné l'univers du jeu de combat. Doté d'un système de combos inédit, il a également introduit quatre nouveaux personnages en plus de Ryu, Ken, Chun Li, etc. Incarnez-les pour triompher de vos adversaires ! Choisissez T. Hawk, le monstre de puissance, Dee Jay, le kickboxeur, Fei Long, le spécialiste du Kung Fu ou bien Cammy, la beauté fatale ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

GB.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
GB.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
BE.description: À sa sortie, Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers a révolutionné l'univers du jeu de combat. Doté d'un système de combos inédit, il a également introduit quatre nouveaux personnages en plus de Ryu, Ken, Chun Li, etc. Incarnez-les pour triompher de vos adversaires ! Choisissez T. PL.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
PL.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
IT.description: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers, con la sua uscita, ha rivoluzionato l'universo dei picchiaduro! Con un sistema di combo innovativo, questo titolo introduce quattro nuovi personaggi che si aggiungono al cast originale composto da Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, e altri ancora. Vesti i panni di uno dei nuovi lottatori e metti al tappeto il tuo avversario! Cimentati in questo picchiaduro scegliendo tra T. Hawk, un mostro di potenza, Dee Jay, il kick boxer senza pari, Fei Long, lo specialista del Kung Fu, e Cammy, l'agente dalla bellezza fatale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

LU.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
LU.description: À sa sortie, Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers a révolutionné l'univers du jeu de combat. Doté d'un système de combos inédit, il a également introduit quatre nouveaux personnages en plus de Ryu, Ken, Chun Li, etc. Incarnez-les pour triompher de vos adversaires ! Choisissez T. Hawk, le monstre de puissance, Dee Jay, le kickboxeur, Fei Long, le spécialiste du Kung Fu ou bien Cammy, la beauté fatale ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

NL.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
NL.description: Het vechtspelgenre veranderde voor altijd toen Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuteerde. Het introduceerde niet alleen een revolutionair combo-systeem, maar ook nieuwe vechters. Naast Ryu, Ken, Chun Li en de rest van de oude garde staan nu vier nieuwe vechters klaar! Kies voor T. Hawk, een boom van een kerel met de kracht van een beer. Of voor Dee Jay met zijn ongeëvenaarde kickbokstechnieken. Kies Fei Long, een kung fu specialist of de dodelijke Cammy. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

HR.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
HR.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. CH.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
CH.description: Als Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers erschien, hat es das Kampfspielgenre für immer verändert. Zusammen mit einem revolutionären Kombo-System brachte es auch neue Charaktere mit sich. Außer z. B. Ryu, Ken, Chun Li kannst du dir jetzt mit vier brandneuen Akteuren hitzige Kämpfe liefern. Wähle T. Hawk mit seiner beispiellosen Kraft, Dee Jay und sein unerreichtes Können als Kickboxer, das feurige Kung-Fu von Fei Long, oder lehre deinen Gegnern mit der gefährlich hübschen Cammy das Fürchten! Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

RU.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
RU.description: Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers навсегда изменила представление о жанре файтинга: в ней появилась революционная система подсчета комбо, которая вывела игру на качественно новый уровень. Кроме того, в команде помимо Ryu, Ken, Chun Li и остальных бойцов появились четыре новых воина: невероятно сильный T. Hawk, кикбоксер-виртуоз Dee Jay, неукротимый мастер кунг-фу Fei Long и смертельно опасная красавица Cammy! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

PT.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
PT.description: Quando Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers estreou, o género jogos de luta mudou para sempre. Introduziu personagens novos ao elenco original, juntamente com um sistema inovador de ataques combinados. Para além de Ryu, Ken, Chun Li e outros, podes participar em batalhas emocionantes com quatro novos guerreiros. Seleciona T. Hawk e a sua força inigualável, as habilidades únicas de kickboxing de Dee Jay, o Kung Fu furioso de Fei Long ou derrota os teus rivais com a beleza mortal de Cammy! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

NZ.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
NZ.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

LV.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
LV.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

MT.name: Super Street Fighter™Ⅱ: The New Challengers
MT.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever. Along with a revolutionary combo system, it introduced new characters alongside the original cast. In addition to Ryu, Ken, Chun Li et al., take control of four brand new combatants in thrilling head-to-head gameplay. Choose T. Hawk and his unmatched strength, Dee Jay's unrivalled kickboxing ability, the furious kung fu of Fei Long, or drill your rivals with the deadly beauty of Cammy! This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Super Street Fighter™ II: The New Challengers
MX.description: Después del lanzamiento de Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers, el género de pelea cambió para siempre. Además del revolucionario sistema de combinaciones de movimientos, el juego también presenta a una nueva oleada de personajes que se une a los personajes originales de Street Fighter II. ¡Además de los personajes ya conocidos, los jugadores pueden escoger a cuatro personajes completamente nuevos para enfrentarse en emocionantes peleas! Aplasta a tus rivales con la fuerza de T. Hawk. Usa la incomparable habilidad de kickboxing de Dee Jay para vencer a tus oponentes. Pelea usando la furiosa técnica de kung fu de Fei Long y libera al dragón que llevas dentro. Obtén la victoria al taladrar a tus enemigos con la belleza fatal de Cammy. ¡Prepárate para el torneo de Street Fighter y para pelear!

NO.description: When Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers debuted, the fighting game genre changed forever.
